titleStmt.title: A Further account of New Jersey in an abstract of letters lately writ from thence / by several inhabitants there resident.

notesStmt.note: Letters from Quakers in East and West Jersey.
The letters are by Richard Hartshorne, Martha S., Robert Wade, Ester Huckens, and Roger Pederick.
For complete contents of this edition see: NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
